weather.summary: Saturday: 13°C, overcast clouds. Sunday: 12°C, overcast clouds

metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend filled with diggers, trains and farm animals! We've found some awesome adventures, including a DLR ride to see llamas and a chance to explore dinosaur skeletons!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore London's biggest urban farm! See llamas, cows, pigs, and chickens. There's plenty of space for George to run around and get muddy.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It combines a DLR train ride (sit at the front!) with lots of farm animals to see and muddy puddles to splash in.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute (25 mins)
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit
activities.description: A smaller, more local farm. See pigs, goats, donkeys and chickens. Enjoy the cafe and maybe even try some pottery!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can get up close to farm animals and maybe even help with feeding time.

transport.fromHackney: 394 or 26 bus to Hackney City Farm (15 mins)
transport.tip: Check for pottery workshops for kids!

activities.title: Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park Adventure
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay (sand and water play). Plenty of space to run around!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can get muddy in Tumbling Bay, run around in the open spaces, and enjoy the slides and swings.

activities.title: Young V&A Play Time
activities.description: Explore the dedicated under 5s play area and get hands-on with design workshops. A great indoor option.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll love the interactive exhibits and play area designed just for his age.

transport.fromHackney: 26 or 55 bus to Bethnal Green (20 mins)
transport.tip: Check for special family events and workshops!

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Dive into interactive storytelling, dressing up and character visits. A perfect place to spark his imagination!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can dress up as his favourite characters and immerse himself in exciting stories.

activities.title: Victoria Park Playground Fun
activities.description: Explore the two great playgrounds, see the deer enclosure, and maybe even take a boat ride on the lake!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can run around the playgrounds, see the deer, and maybe even spot some ducks on the lake.

transport.tip: Bring bread to feed the ducks (but only a little!).

activities.title: Springfield Park Riverside Walk and Play
activities.description: Enjoy riverside walks, a cafe for snacks, and a playground with great views over the marshes. Perfect for a relaxing afternoon.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can enjoy running around, splashing near the river, and playing on the playground.

transport.tip: Look out for wildlife along the river!

activities.title: Dinosaur Discovery at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: Roar with the T-Rex in the Dinosaur Gallery and marvel at the Blue Whale in Hintze Hall. Don't forget to visit the Investigate Centre for hands-on fun!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dinosaurs, dinosaurs, and more dinosaurs! Plus, hands-on activities to explore.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington (45 mins)
transport.tip: Go early to avoid the biggest crowds!

activities.title: London Transport Museum Adventure
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, explore the tube simulator, and enjoy the All Aboard play zone. A perfect day for a transport enthusiast!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can climb on real buses and trains, and even try driving a tube train!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Oxford Circus, then Central line to Covent Garden (40 mins)
transport.tube: Covent Garden or Leicester Sq (Piccadilly line)
transport.tip: Take the lift to avoid stairs at Covent Garden tube.

activities.title: National Maritime Museum Ahoy!
activities.description: Explore ships, play in the AHOY! children's gallery, and enjoy the great playground outside.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can explore ship galleries and play in the dedicated children's area.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Canada Water, then Jubilee line to North Greenwich, then bus or walk (45 mins)
transport.tip: Take the Thames Clipper from Tower Pier for a scenic boat ride!

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs and Farm
activities.description: See the famous Victorian dinosaur statues on the islands, visit the farm, and get lost in the maze. Plus, there's a great playground!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dinosaurs! And a farm! And a playground! What's not to love?

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Brixton, then Overground to Crystal Palace (1 hour)

activities.title: RAF Museum Flight Adventure
activities.description: Explore huge aircraft hangers, experience the 4D cinema, and enjoy the outdoor playground. A great day for plane enthusiasts!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can see real planes and helicopters up close!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Gospel Oak, then Overground to Kentish Town, then Northern Line to Colindale (50 mins)
transport.tip: Check for special events and demonstrations.

activities.title: Science Museum - The Garden & Trains
activities.description: Explore The Garden (under 5s area), see the Flight gallery, and discover trains in Making the Modern World. Wonderlab is paid but interactive!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: The Garden is perfect for his age and he'll be fascinated by the trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington (45 mins)
transport.tip: Wonderlab requires tickets, book in advance!

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: Join Duggee and the Squirrels for a fun-filled live show with singing, dancing, and earning badges!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee come to life! He'll love singing and dancing along with his favourite characters.

transport.tip: Book tickets early to get the best seats!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: Experience life-size dinosaur puppets in this thrilling and educational show. Get up close and personal with amazing creatures!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Life-size dinosaurs! He'll be amazed by the realistic puppets.

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs are a bit scary, so be prepared to reassure him!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance along with Peppa Pig and her friends in this interactive live show.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He loves Peppa Pig! He'll enjoy singing and dancing to the familiar songs.

transport.tip: Bring earplugs if he's sensitive to loud noises.

activities.title: Room on the Broom (Scamp Theatre)
activities.description: A magical adaptation of Julia Donaldson's beloved book, filled with music, puppetry, and fun!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll be captivated by the puppets and the story!

transport.tip: Check the venue's accessibility information beforehand.

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Shows
activities.description: Check out their regular kids' shows - always something fun and engaging for little ones.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A local theatre with age-appropriate shows!

transport.fromHackney: Bus or Overground to Limehouse (20 mins)
transport.tip: Check the website for specific show details and age recommendations.

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: See Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad as never before in this brand-new theatrical adaptation of the Emmy® award-winning children's television series.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He loves Bluey! He'll enjoy seeing Bluey and Bingo in a live show

transport.tip: Book tickets early to get the best seats!
